mapper.update:
update t_fraud_his_result
TASK_NODE_NAME = #{taskNodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

OLD_FIELD_NAME = #{oldFieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OLD_FIELD_VALUE = #{oldFieldValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_fraud_his_result set TASK_NODE_NAME = #{taskNodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_BLACK = #{isBlack,jdbcType=BIT}, NEW_FIELD_NAME = #{newFieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEW_FIELD_VALUE = #{newFieldValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OLD_APP_ID = #{oldAppId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OLD_FIELD_NAME = #{oldFieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OLD_FIELD_VALUE = #{oldFieldValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from t_fraud_his_result where APP_ID = #{appId} and TASK_NODE_NAME = #{taskNodeName}
mapper.select: select * from t_fraud_his_result where APP_ID = #{appId} and TASK_NODE_NAME = #{taskNodeName} order by seq
